introduction: The protagonist of the film - Viktor Petrovich, a graduate of the institute, came to a small rural school by assignment. By chance, he was immediately appointed director. But due to the lack of pedagogical experience, Victor makes a number of mistakes, follows the lead of the head teacher of the school and the inspector of the RONO. The picture traces the relationship between Viktor Petrovich and the head teacher of the school, Galina Pavlovna, a woman with a difficult fate who came to school in the post-war years; with a young teacher, Irina Alekseevna; with school students.
